Wolves Across the Border

Bring 8 pieces of Tough Wolf Meat to Eagan Peltskinner outside Northshire Abbey.
8
8
8
8
8
8
8
8
8
8
Tough Wolf Meat (8)

Description

I hate those nasty timber wolves! But I sure like eating wolf steaks... Bring me tough wolf meat and I will exchange it for something you'll find useful.

Tough wolf meat is gathered from hunting the timber wolves and young wolves wandering the Northshire countryside.

Reward

You can choose one of these awards:
Soft Fur-lined Shoes
Wolfskin Bracers

Progress

Hey <name>. I'm getting hungry...did you get that tough wolf meat?

Completion

You've been busy! I can't wait to cook up that wolf meat...

I have some things here you might want - take your pick!

Gains

Upon completion of quests, get:
  • 170 Experience
  • 100 Reputation with Stormwind
